events.message: I received the new headphones today, but there is a noticeable scratch on the ear cup and the sound quality is not clear.
The reported problem involves a physical scratch and potential product defect affecting sound quality, categorized accordingly.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle the defective product claim for this case.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the issues with your headphones. I’m here to help resolve this as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide photos of the scratch and describe any problems you’re having with the sound quality in more detail?
Attached are the pictures showing the scratch on the ear cup. The sound is crackly and sometimes drops out during calls.
Thank you for the info and photos. We can offer a replacement or a full refund. Please let us know your preference.
I would prefer a replacement if possible, as I really like the model otherwise.
A replacement unit has been approved and will be shipped to your address within the next 3 business days.
Just checking in to ensure the replacement headphones arrived and are working well without any defects.
Yes, the replacement arrived today and everything works perfectly now. Thanks for the prompt support!
We’re closing this case as resolved. Please reach out anytime if you need further assistance.
